attributes.action: Those who are Self Employed should be given their 4th grant ASAP.
attributes.additional_details: Our third grant was given to cover us during the months of November, December and January. Therefore the 4th grant should have been issued in February, to cover for February, March and April. Instead it has been back dated to be given at the end of April to cover us for these months. Those in industries that are shut due to lockdown have no way of receiving income from our jobs. How are we supposed to live with no income for 3 months, whilst those on furlough still receive their money.
attributes.background: Those who are Self-Empolyed should be given their  4th Self Employed Income Support Scheme ASAP.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign this petition which we currently have open on the same topic:

Bring the fourth SEISS grant payment forward to March
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577730
